Author: Azaryxe
Text: I recently watched a video by Kati Morton answering the question "could I have made up my ED?" or something along those lines. In short, yes you can, your brain makes it up as a way to cope. But it's not the ED that's the issue, it's what it's hiding. However, you can't make up your ED in the sense that you've been faking it. What you've experienced is valid and real.  She does a far better job of explaining it than I could ever do. https://youtu.be/BDCs6q0wgz4  No two people have the same experience of an illness. There will be common factors, but it is individual to you. The fact you may be able to eat what the hospital gives you without much thought does not make your struggle any less valid than someone who might freak out about.
